ing: 3 1/2 cups SwansonÂ® Chicken Broth or SwansonÂ® Natural GoodnessÂ® Chicken Broth or SwansonÂ® Certified Organic Chicken Broth
1 cup cubed cooked turkey or chicken
des: "Here is a great idea for that leftover turkey! Combine it with a few simple ingredients to make a sensational soup that's incredibly good. It's a breeze to prepare, but one taste guarantees that this will become a soup time favorite recipe."
ins:
Heat the broth, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, carrot and celery in a 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat to a boil.
Stir the noodles and turkey in the saucepan. Reduce the heat to medium.  Cook for 10 minutes or until the noodles are tender.
